item.title: Narrative of an Exploratory Tour of the North East of the Colony of the Cape of Good Hope
item.scopeAndContent:
[Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of Arbousset, Thomas, Narrative of An Exploratory Tour North-East of the Colony of the Cape of Good Hope by the Revs. T. Arbousset and F. Daumas, translated by Brown, John Croumbie. Cape Town: A. S. Robertson and Saul Solomon, 1846 [1842].]
[Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of the book published by the French missionary Thomas Arbousset in 1846, being the first translation in English of the 1842 French edition. This edition did not include lithographies and it is unclear if it included the map; this copy does not include the map.]
